name: uncompetitive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not involving or encouraging competition: We want to make sure they are not allowed to employ uncompetitive practices when they are bidding against us. He was irritated for years by the bank's uncompetitive rates of interest.
uncompetitive products and services are not as good as other products or services with similar prices: If you stop paying overtime and your competitors don't, you become very uncompetitive. The company does not accept orders at uncompetitive prices.
